scripts.dev: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -c development -- node build/app.js
scripts.prod: npm ci && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -c production -- node build/app.js
scripts.db:dev:migrate: dotenv -e .env -c development -- prisma migrate dev --name init-db
scripts.db:dev:seed:all: dotenv -e .env -c development ts-node src/tests/mocks/seedCharacters.ts && dotenv -e .env -c development ts-node tests/mocks/seedRelics.ts
scripts.db:prod:migrate: dotenv -e .env -c production npx prisma migrate deploy
